fields.name: modifier
fields.description: The field for the modifier record component.

fields.name: canUse
fields.description: The field for the canUse record component.

fields.name: description
fields.description: The field for the description record component.

constructors.name: Option
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a Option record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) .

methods.name: modifier
methods.description: Returns the value of the modifier record component.

methods.name: canUse
methods.description: Returns the value of the canUse record component.

methods.name: description
methods.description: Returns the value of the description record component.
